table_caption: Brain activations and deactivations related to task difficulty (p < .005, FWE corrected)
table_foot: Abbreviations: ACC, anterior cingulate cortex; DLPFC, dorsolateral prefrontal cortex; DMPFC, dorsomedial prefrontal cortex; PCC, posterior cingulate cortex; SMA, supplementary motor area; VMPFC, ventromedial prefrontal cortex.
